p: Finally, the need for new treatments is strikingly illustrated by the report from the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, National Institute of Health (NIH) [ 5] that notes the need for new therapeutics to help overcome the global epidemic of sexually transmitted infections, including trichomoniasis, chlamydia, gonorrhea, and syphilis. Will the anti-trichomonad compounds and extracts described in the present study also inhibit pathogens that cause chlamydia, gonorrhea, syphilis, the coronavirus and the human immunodeficiency (HIV) virus?
